metadata.title: CVE-2023-45918 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
ncurses 6.4-20230610 has a NULL pointer dereference in tgetstr intinfo/lib_termcap.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-45918` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lib32ncurses6 - 6.4+20230625-2
lib32ncursesw6 - 6.4+20230625-2
lib32tinfo6 - 6.4+20230625-2
lib64ncurses6 - 6.4+20230625-2
lib64ncursesw6 - 6.4+20230625-2
lib64tinfo6 - 6.4+20230625-2
libncurses6 - 6.4+20230625-2
libncursesw6 - 6.4+20230625-2
libtinfo6 - 6.4+20230625-2
ncurses-base - 6.4+20230625-2
ncurses-bin - 6.4+20230625-2
ncurses-examples - 6.4+20230625-2
ncurses-term - 6.4+20230625-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ncurses package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.4+20230625-2').
